p: In this work, fast ionic conductors in the solid state, based on the LiBH 4–MgO system, were investigated. The samples were mechanochemically synthetized. The Li-ion conductivity of LiBH 4 was improved in all cases, and the samples containing 53 v/v % of MgO showed the best enhancement (2.86 × 10 –4 S cm –1 at 20 °C), since the volume fraction of LiBH 4 allowed to completely fill the pore volume of MgO. The formation of a highly conductive layer does not affect the electrochemical stability window, which is similar to that of pure LiBH 4 ( i.e., about 2.2 V vs Li +/Li).
